name: Blood in the Air
summary: Once you've locked on to a target, little can obscure your aim.
description:
Once you've locked on to a target, little can obscure your aim. Make a ranged weapon Strike against the required target. This Strike ignores the target's concealed condition and reduces the flat check for the hidden condition from 11 to 5.Traits

Concentrate: An action with this trait requires a degree of mental concentration and discipline.
